header.div: Read the text below and practise giving a short talk.

div.p: The Examiner says, "Now I'm going to give you a topic. You will have one to two minutes to talk." The Examiner explains that you can make notes, and hands over paper and pencil, and reads out the topic to you.
Describe the technological device you find most useful.You should say:

ul.li: what advantages and disadvantages it has and explain how it has changed your life-style

div.p: 3.Write down some ideas – you have one minute to think starting now
4.Stop writing when one minute is up (or before)
5.You now have two minutes to talk, starting now! (Don't be embarrassed!)
